const notifications_service_1 = require("./notifications.service");
const pagination_options_1 = require("../utils/types/pagination-options");
let NotificationsController = class NotificationsController {
    constructor(notificationService) {
        this.notificationService = notificationService;
    }
    async getUnreadNotificationsCount(req) {
        return this.notificationService.getUnreadNotificationsCount(req.user.id);
    }
    async getNotifications(req, page) {
        const newPage = new pagination_options_1.IPaginationOptions();
        newPage.page = page;
        newPage.limit = 3;
        return this.notificationService.getNotifications(newPage, req.user.id);
    }
    async readNotification(req, id) {
        return this.notificationService.readNotification(id);
    }
};
